text: Shelly Willingham (born November 27, 1943) is a Democratic member of the North Carolina House of Representatives. He represents the 23rd district. He previously served in the House from 2001 to 2002. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Democrats Category:1943 births Category:Members of the North Carolina House of Representatives Category:African-American state legislators in North Carolina Category:21st- century American politicians
title: Shelly Willingham
